Conf Manager¶

This module is used to generate world-options. At it’s heart is Python’s own ConfigParser, with a wx GUI over the top.

If you would like to use it in your own projects, it is freely available from the confmanager github.

Conf Manager API¶

A configuration manager using wxPython and ConfigParser.

Written by Chris Norman.

class confmanager.ConfManager(self, title)¶

Use this class to make your configuration objects.

add_section(section)¶

In addition to adding a section (ConfigParser style), adds it to self._config, so it’s ready for the extra values generated by self.set.

get_converted(section, option)¶

Returns the option’s value converted into it’s intended type.

get_dump()¶

Dumps all the sections and options as a dictionary.

get_gui()¶

Gets a GUI based on this object.

get_spec(section, option)¶

Gets the real deal from self._config. Arguments are the same as if you were making a call to self.get.

remove_option(section, option)¶

Removes options from the configparser object and the _config list.

remove_section(section)¶

Removes sections from the conf object, and the _config list.

set(self, section, option, value = None, vtype = None, vtitle = None, vvalidate = lambda value: None, vhelp = '', vcontrol = None, vkwargs = dict(), vinclude = True)¶

In addition to adding the value to the underlying ConfigParser object, add the extra stuff to self._config, where it can be used for GUI creation.

vtype is the desired type for the new option (ConfigParser stores everything as strings). vtitle is the friendly name for the value (will be used for textual labels etc). vvalidate is a lambda which will be called by ConfigFrame.onOk when checking all the values. Should return None if the value is ok, or an error message as a string. vhelp is the help message which will be tacked onto the control in the GUI. vcontrol is the control which will be used in the GUI. vkwargs is the keyword arguments which will be passed to the control when it’s created by self.get_gui. vinclude tells the GUI whether or not to include this value in the resulting configuration screens.

Also alerts of a change, using self.updateFunc.

toggle(section, option)¶

Toggles option in section.
